name: Shining Haze
description:
Do you know the meaning of life?

There is no clear definition yet, but please play our story-filled game, with lots minigames, and take a journey through the three stages of life.

This is our latest game, released in 2019. Since then we've been working on a big project, named "Project Unknown", scheduled to release in early 3023.

Translated using DeepL Translator Free Trial
